channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump has ‘an alcoholic’s personality, chief of staff says in wide-ranging Vanity Fair interview. She calls it a ‘hit piece’
item.description: Susie Wiles also told Vanity Fair that she has read the Epstein file and that Trump is “not in the file doing anything awful.”

item.title: US added 64K jobs in November after losing 105K in October, delayed report shows
item.description: The Labor Department released the highly anticipated November jobs report which showed the U.S. economy added jobs despite uncertainty over inflation.

item.title: Codex Improves Itself, Babysits Its Own Training And Calls For Help When It’s Down
item.description: Codex helps build and monitor itself, clarifying Copilot branding, while raising eerie autonomy questions online.

item.title: Unemployment hits 4-year high as frozen jobs data shows recession risks getting ‘uncomfortably high,’ top economist Mark Zandi says
item.description: Payroll growth for November came in at a modest 64,000. “There’s just no forward motion,” Moody’s chief economist told Fortune.

item.title: Mozilla Bets Trust And User-First AI Wins The New Browser Wars
item.description: Mozilla names Anthony Enzor-DeMeo CEO, betting trust and user-first AI will win the third browser war. With 27% of Americans trusting Big Tech, timing...

item.title: You can make up to $200K working in Trump’s new ‘Tech Force’—and you don’t need a degree or work experience
item.description: To be eligible for the two-year program, you only need "strong problem-solving abilities and a passion for public service."​

item.title: Oil Prices Drop Below $60—Lowest Level Since Since May
item.description: A mix of oversupply and geopolitical factors is putting downward pressure on oil prices.

item.title: The VC Landscape In 2025: Key Trends That Shaped The Year
item.description: AI mega-rounds, fewer seed deals, and private equity’s rise are redefining venture capital in 2025. What founders need to know now.

item.title: Government belatedly reveals loss of 105,000 jobs in October as full DOGE cutbacks come into view
item.description: Both the October and November job creation numbers, released Tuesday by the Labor Department, came in late because of the 43-day government shutdown.

item.title: ‘Fallout’ Season 2 Arrives With 100% Critics’ Score On Rotten Tomatoes
item.description: “Fallout” is back with Season 2, starring Ella Purnell, Walton Goggins, Aaron Moten and Kyle MacLachlan, and Rotten Tomatoes Critics are loving it so ...

item.title: An MIT roboticist who cofounded bankrupt Roomba maker iRobot says Elon Musk’s vision of humanoid robot assistants is ‘pure fantasy thinking’
item.description: Rodney Brooks said future “humanoid” robots will have wheels and multiple arms.

item.title: Scott Bessent says real affordability relief, 'substantial drop' in inflation coming soon
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent predicts inflation relief and tax refunds for Americans in 2026, forecasting a "bountiful" economic year ahead for Ma...

item.title: South Korean battery stocks slump on Ford's EV decision
Wall Street anxiously awaits tardy October retail data and November jobs report
S&P cites tariffs and inflation as U.S. economy sags near year-end
Economic calendar: Data-intensive morning features shutdown-delayed jobs report

Powell acknowledges labor market slowdown but rejects fears of steep decline
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell discusses labor market outlook after the third interest rate cut this year, citing unemployment rise to 4.4% and s...

item.title: Energy secretary says electricity prices will drop under Trump administration policies
item.description: Energy Secretary Chris Wright said that President Donald Trump's pro-energy policies will stop rising electricity prices and eventually reduce costs d...

item.title: Powell says he wants to 'turn this job over' with economy in 'really good shape' before departure
item.description: Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell wants to leave office with inflation at 2% and strong job market when his term ends in May 2026, avoiding legacy t...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
